imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Parquet flooring in a bright modern interior photo (parquet-flooring-001.dim_1600x1200.jpg)

existing_features.title: Create a new generated static image asset for the Parquet Flooring service and place it under frontend/public/assets/generated with the exact filename specified in the image requirements.
Add a new gallery media item for the Parquet Flooring category so it can be rendered by the existing MediaStrip component.
Enable media rendering for the Parquet Flooring entry in the Services page "Additional Offerings" section by wiring it to the Parquet Flooring media category.

new_feature_requests.summary: Apply the same recently added functionality/changes to the parquet flooring service (as was done for the vertical blinds service).

projectName: Apply Vertical Blinds gallery/media setup to Parquet Flooring service
